name: Feed Yommo
description:
This is a simple but fun game i've been making

I do everything myself so i'd enjoy some feedback and reports on bugs

Features Include

- Cute Minions

- Auto Minions (Current Limit is 30)

- Yommo

- One upgrade for now

- Save / Load Features

- Dev Cheats for Infinite Minions and Gems (Left Ctrl + Left Alt)

Planned Features

- More Upgrades

- Somewhat of a story line (Want to make it dark by the end since it's cute)

- Places

- Tools

- Speed Boosts

- More ideas down the line 

Known Bugs

- If you click too fast you sometimes get an extra minion

- For some reason the sound doesn't want to be controlled like the music volume

I'll update with more info soon so let me know what you think

Ps. enjoy the dev cheats while they're there haha

Music provided by ZapSplat

Sounds provided by SoundBible
